title: Ticket #7631: Automatically allow NEGOTIATOR authorization to register with CCB
description:
We automatically allow daemons with ADVERTISE_{STARTD,SCHEDD,MASTER} permission to register with the CCB.

What's the obvious missing daemon? The negotiator!

OSG is beginning to move the negotiator to a separate k8s pod and would benefit if it could register with the CCB.
